publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2358 Tommy Sheridan: Deportation of Ulla Roder-That the Parliament notes with grave concern that Ulla Roder, a Danish peace campaigner, is currently threatened with deportation, finds it particularly inappropriate that the threat of deportation is raised against a peaceful activist within the borders of the European Union, especially when the European Convention on Human Rights, which normally underpins that Union so strongly, defends the right to protest, and asks the Executive to make representations to Her Majesty's Government to reject any requests to deport this peace activist who has consistently campaigned for a nuclear-free Scotland.
S1M-2358 Deportation of Ulla Roder (lodged on 24 October 2001) Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S1M-2358 Deportation of Ulla Roder (lodged on 24 October 2001) Ms Sandra White*
S1M-2358 Deportation of Ulla Roder (lodged on 24 October 2001) Robin Harper*, Shona Robison*
S1M-2358 Deportation of Ulla Roder (lodged on 24 October 2001) Linda Fabiani*
S1M-2358 Deportation of Ulla Roder (lodged on 24 October 2001) Irene McGugan*, Brian Adam*
S1M-2358 Deportation of Ulla Roder (lodged on 24 October 2001) Fiona Hyslop*
S1M-2358 Deportation of Ulla Roder (lodged on 24 October 2001) Ms Margo MacDonald*
S1M-2358 Deportation of Ulla Roder (lodged on 24 October 2001) Mr Lloyd Quinan* Â
S1M-2358 Deportation of Ulla Roder (lodged on 24 October 2001) Mr Kenneth Gibson*
